Quaternion Function Reference

zeroso

Octonion zeros matrix

Syntax

Y = zeroso(N)

Description

zeroso(X) returns a full octonion matrix of zeros. Accepts the same parameters as the MATLAB® zeros function.

See Also

QTFM function: zerosvo
MATLAB® function: zeros
